SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Garcia Global?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Garcia Global is arc {AtkinsonExpress}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc WeberGroupMart?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc WeberGroupMart is arc {AtkinsonExpress}.

Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Garcia Global} has the largest input flow.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 295? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {311} from {WeberGroupMart} to {Garcia Global}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 200? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {175} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {WeberGroupMart}, a flow of {134} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {Garcia Global}, a flow of {92} from {Garcia Global} to {AtkinsonExpress}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 113 and 252? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {225} from {WeberGroupMart} to {AtkinsonExpress}, a flow of {175} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {WeberGroupMart}, a flow of {134} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {Garcia Global}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Garcia Global to AtkinsonExpress or from WeberGroupMart to Garcia Global?
NC.A: The flow from {WeberGroupMart} to {Garcia Global} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Garcia Global to AtkinsonExpress, from AtkinsonExpress to WeberGroupMart, or from WeberGroupMart to Garcia Global?
NC.A: The flow from {WeberGroupMart} to {Garcia Global} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {WeberGroupMart}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Garcia Global} and {WeberGroupMart}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc WeberGroupMart, Arc Garcia Global, Arc AtkinsonExpress}.
